name: Truth or Dare Teens Game (Free)
description:
Truth or Dare game that is safe to be played by teenagers. It contains almost 500 predefined questions.

** This version is ad-supported and has no other limitations. If you want to get rid of advertisement, use Remove Ads from Settings screen.
It is fully customizable, you can add, modify, delete, organize the questions as you like.


Main features:
- 3 level advance mode: progressive, manual or random;
- players profile photos;
- players score view;
- questions organized in levels;
- fully customizable levels: add / edit / delete / enable / disable / order;
- fully customizable questions: add / edit / delete / enable / disable;
- customizable playing mode;
- about 500 predefined questions most suitable for teens, with no sexual content.

Have fun!
